vulnerabilities.title: @discordjs/opus vulnerable to Denial of Service
vulnerabilities.description: All versions of the package @discordjs/opus are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) due to providing an input object with a property toString to several different functions. Exploiting this vulnerability could lead to a process crash.

vulnerabilities.title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption in @discordjs/opus
vulnerabilities.description:
Improperly handled errors in @discordjs/opus cause hard crashes instead of returning the error to user land. All versions of package @discordjs/opus (<= 0.7.0) are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) when trying to encode using an encoder with zero channels, or a non-initialized buffer. This leads to a hard crash due to improperly returning the errors from the invalid inputs.

As of version 0.8.0, the errors are correctly returned to the user and are no longer throwing hard crashes that cannot
